description: Featuring their classic word logo and created to handle a wide range of high-output mountain activities, this short-sleeved Cormac is designed for performance comfort. Ostria™, its lightweight gridded fabric, feels great, breathes, and is made with wicking yarns. A long-lasting DAO (Durable Anti Odour) finish keeps it fresh, and the fit allows airflow to keep it cool.
name: Arcteryx Cormac Arc`Word SS - Mens
